import axios from'axios';var url='https://scales-music.herokuapp.com/';// const url = 'http://localhost:4000/';
var requestAuth=function requestAuth(){return axios.post("".concat(url,"api/spotify/request_auth"));};var getToken=function getToken(code){return axios.post("".concat(url,"api/spotify/get_token"),{code:code});};var createSpotifyPlaylist=function createSpotifyPlaylist(token){return axios.post("".concat(url,"api/spotify/create_play_list"),{token:token});};var getPlaylist=function getPlaylist(token){return axios.post("".concat(url,"api/spotify/get_play_list"),{token:token});};var removeTrack=function removeTrack(track,user){return axios.post("".concat(url,"api/spotify/remove_track"),{track:track,user:user});};var getSearch=function getSearch(accessToken,search){return axios.post("".concat(url,"api/spotify/search"),{accessToken:accessToken,search:search});};var addTrack=function addTrack(track,user){return axios.post("".concat(url,"api/spotify/add_track"),{track:track,user:user});};var getTracks=function getTracks(albumId,accessToken){return axios.post("".concat(url,"api/spotify/get_album_tracks"),{albumId:albumId,accessToken:accessToken});};export{requestAuth,getToken,createSpotifyPlaylist,getPlaylist,removeTrack,getSearch,addTrack,getTracks};
